betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §6Energy Cube§r is a §ereally useful Mekanism block§r because it is able to §estore and transport a lot of energy§r, with each advancing tier being §ecapable of storing more energy§r.

To craft a Tier 1 Energy Cube (§6Basic Energy Cube§r): Four §6Redstone Dust§r, two §6Iron Ingot§rs, two §6Energy Tablet§rs, and a §6Steel Casing§r.

To craft a Tier 2 Energy Cube (§6Advanced Energy Cube§r): Four §6Enriched Alloy§rs, two Energy Tablets, two §6Osmium Ingot§rs, and a Basic Energy Cube (T1).

To craft a Tier 3 Energy Cube (§6Elite Energy Cube§r): Four §6Reinforced Alloy§rs, two Energy Tablets, two §6Gold Ingot§rs, and an Advanced Energy Cube (T2).

To craft a Tier 4 Energy Cube (§6Ultimate Energy Cube§r): Four §6Atomic Alloy§rs, two §6Diamond§rs, two Energy Tablets, and an Elite Energy Cube (T3).
